SummaryEnglish: It is the wedding of the Elf Queen Meier, and Liya (Ashley Boettcher) is excited to invite Little Fish (Ryan Potter). The queen allows the request for Liya even though the to-be elf king and Liya's brother disapproves. At the land of the old great battle where the spirits of the many slain elves lurk, sister of the queen, Meyla is a dark elf tries to control the power of the dark stone of death. She resurrects the spirits as her soldiers and gatecrashes the wedding ceremony. Meyla kidnaps Meier and asks the elves to give her the gem of life and elvish map in exchange.
